info.name: Scryfall : back to magiccards.info
info.description:
The Scryfall is bloated and really sucks compared to the older magiccardinfo one, wich they bought.
This is a 5 minute "style" to make it functional again, its not close to magiccardinfo but at least it doesn't
have me screaming at scryfall every time I have to search something.
